title: Serious issue with trying to play the game but hoping its not too serious on either side of it.
body: Lately as I try to play any game such as WoW or League and I would need to tab out for anything most of the time it goes normally. But currently when I try to tab out and back into league my display stops working all together and I have to restart my computer. Not sure if its your end and praying that its not on my end since the GPU I have is almost 3x the cost it used to be when I first got it. If there's anything that isn't worth 3 kidneys and a soul that may be the cause of the issue I would be more than glad to take it :)

replies.body: I've seen this kind of problem popup when a pc just has issues with tabbing between windows when they're in fullscreen. Have you tried switching to windowed mode to see if that lets you alt+tab easier?
I'm glad that moderators are able to see this and answer thanks Riot
